entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow this morning and early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 27. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Friday 29 April 2016

entry.title: Friday night: Sunny. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 28. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Friday 29 April 2016
